info.name: info
info.description: Display information on the use of auto-channels.

details.name: details
details.description: Display information of a specific auto-channel.

voice-channel.name: voice-channel
voice-channel.description: The voice-channel used as an auto-channel.

list.name: list
list.description: Display short information of all the configurations.

assign.name: assign
assign.description: Assign a voice-channel as an auto-channel.

type.name: type
type.description: What kind of channels are generated.

generation-name.name: generation-name
generation-name.description: The name of the generated channels.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Undo the assignment of an auto-channel.

generated-name.name: generated-name
generated-name.description: The new name for generated channels.

role-distributor.name: role-distributor
role-distributor.description: Manage the automated role distribution of message interactions.

button.name: button
button.description: Create a message that gives roles when the button is pressed.

list.name: list
list.description: Create a message where users can select roles from a list.

poll.name: poll
poll.description: Create new polls for users to answer.

duration.name: duration
duration.description: The time until the result needs to be posted. Example: 4d3h2m -> 4 days, 3 hours, 2 minutes

multi-select.name: multi-select
multi-select.description: Whether or not the poll allows for multiple options to be selected.

raffle.name: raffle
raffle.description: Create a new raffle for users to join.

new.name: new
new.description: Create a new raffle for users to join.

duration.name: duration
duration.description: The time until the result need to be posted. Example: 4d3h2m -> 4 days, 3 hours, 2 minutes

chat.name: chat
chat.description: Engage in a casual, but probably still weird, conversation with me.

start.name: start
start.description: Engage in a casual, but probably still weird, conversation with me.

message.name: message
message.description: The message to start the conversation with.

command.name: command
command.description: The name of the custom command to run.

custom-commands.name: custom-commands
custom-commands.description: Manage customized commands and their respective response.

list.name: list
list.description: Display all custom commands of this server.

add.name: add
add.description: Add a custom command for this server.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Remove one of this server's custom commands.

music.name: music
music.description: Play music in a channel or get the lyrics of a song.

join.name: join
join.description: Connect me to the voice channel you're in.

leave.name: leave
leave.description: Disconnect me from your voice channel.

play.name: play
play.description: Request a song to be played.

song.name: song
song.description: Video-url, playlist-url, or name of a song you want to play.

resume.name: resume
resume.description: Continue playing the previously paused song.

stop.name: stop
stop.description: Stop the current song and don't continue playing.

playing.name: playing
playing.description: Show what song is currently playing.

queue.name: queue
queue.description: Show the songs in the queue.

shuffle.name: shuffle
shuffle.description: Shuffle the songs in the queue.

skip.name: skip
skip.description: Skip a song and continue playing with the next one.

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of songs to skip.

clear.name: clear
clear.description: Remove all the songs from the queue.

volume.name: volume
volume.description: Change the volume of the music.

lyrics.name: lyrics
lyrics.description: Get the lyrics of a song.

birthday.name: birthday
birthday.description: Sing a song for a happy fellow.

user.name: user
user.description: The user to direct it towards.

neko.name: neko
neko.description: Get a random image of a neko.

random.name: random
random.description: Get a random image of a neko.

lewd.name: lewd
lewd.description: Get a random lewd image of a neko. Only usable in NSFW channels.

invite.name: invite
invite.description: My invite link, so you, or someone else, can add me to a server.

disable-warning.name: disable-warning
disable-warning.description: Disable the warning about the prefix no longer working.

ban.name: ban
ban.description: Ban a user who misbehaves, or just because you feel like it.

duration.name: duration
duration.description: How long to ban the user for.

days.name: days
days.description: Until how many days back the messages of the user should be removed.

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kick a user who misbehaves, or just because you feel like it.

language.name: language
language.description: Manage the language of the server.

current.name: current
current.description: Show what language is currently being used.

set.name: set
set.description: Change the language for this server.

user.name: user
user.description: Send a welcome notification for a specific user.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to send the messages in.

message.name: message
message.description: Configure the message of the notification.

current.name: current
current.description: Display the current message used in the notification.

change.name: change
change.description: Change the message used in the notification.

image.name: image
image.description: Configure the image of the notification.

current.name: current
current.description: Display the current image used in the notification.

change.name: change
change.description: Change the image used in the notification.

url.name: url
url.description: The url of the image. If none is provided, the default image will be used.

disable.name: disable
disable.description: Disable the image used in the notification.
